adminPassword.value: <Enter the password for the Palo Alto user account

fromGatewayLogin.value: <Enter the public IP address that should allowed to connect to the management interface

IPAddressPrefix.value: <Enter the prefix for all ip addresses in this format: 10.5>

virtualNetworkName.value: <Enter the name of the vNet to create>

mgmtSubnet.value: <Enter the name of the Management subnet>

untrustSubnet.value: <Enter the name of the Untrusted subnet>

trustSubnet.value: <Enter the name of the Trust Subnet>

storageAccountName.value: <Enter the name of the storage account to create>

fwvmName.value: <Enter the name of the Palo Alto VM>

adminUserName.value: <Enter the username for the Palo Alto user account>

dmzSubnet.value: <Enter the name of the DMZ subnet>
